name: iQraPlayer
0:
”Alexa, ask ikra player to play chapter fifty three”
”Alexa, ask ikra player to play audio”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ikra player
des:
iQra player is a Qur'an Audio Player with several reciters. You can say chapter number or name to play a chapter.

It also remembers your last played position for seamless experience from anywhere on any device.

You can say play audio, next previous and chapter number or name to navigate around iQra player. You can also change reciters by saying select reciters, for now only the following reciters are available:

1. Sa`ud ash-Shuraym
2. Mishari Rashid al-`Afasy
3. Muhammad Siddiq al-Minshawi
4. Saad al-Ghamdi
5. Sudais and Shuraym
6. AbdulBaset AbdulSamad [Murattal]
7. Maher al-Muaiqly
8. Abdur-Rashid Sufi

More reciters coming soon. 

Feedback is always welcome. Any feature requests please get in touch.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
